metadata.title: CVE-2021-39929 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Uncontrolled Recursion in the Bluetooth DHT dissector in Wireshark 3.4.0 to3.4.9 and 3.2.0 to 3.2.17 allows denial of service via packet injection orcrafted capture file

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
